Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; part of rosette in added white outline with added red centres; exterior: slip mostly worn; part of vertical stroke and two dilute lines; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: The numbers '41A' and '16' are written in pencil on the exterior of the sherd. '16' is written on a label on the interior of the sherd.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0986) (phase 2)
